org.apache.hadoop.mapred.join

接口 ComposableInputFormat<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 所有超级接口:
    InputFormat<K,V>
    所有已知实现类:
    CompositeInputFormat, Parser.Node

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface ComposableInputFormat<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends InputFormat<K,V>
    Refinement of InputFormat requiring implementors to provide ComposableRecordReader instead of RecordReader.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ComposableRecordReader<K,V> getRecordReader(InputSplit split, JobConf job, Reporter reporter)
      Get the RecordReader for the given InputSplit.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputFormat

        getSplits

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRecordReader

        ComposableRecordReader<K,V> getRecordReader(InputSplit split,
                                          JobConf job,
                                          Reporter reporter)
                                                                                                                                  throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Get the RecordReader for the given InputSplit.

        It is the responsibility of the RecordReader to respect record boundaries while processing the logical split to present a record-oriented view to the individual task.

        指定者:
        getRecordReader 在接口中 InputFormat<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        split - the InputSplit
        job - the job that this split belongs to
        返回:
        a RecordReader
        抛出:
        IOException
